channel.title: Comments on: Seth Godin at the Business of Software Conference (Video)
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
Let me know if anything good comes out of it (I want shares :)
It really opened my mind. Made me think about making products that have a built-in "spreading" quality in them.
I think I need to watch the lecture from time to time to recall the important lessons in it.
item.content:encoded:
Let me know if anything good comes out of it (I want shares :)

It really opened my mind. Made me think about making products that have a built-in “spreading” quality in them.

I think I need to watch the lecture from time to time to recall the important lessons in it.

item.title: By: Kila
item.dc:creator: Kila
item.description: Great lecture. I sent it to my director - let's see if we can use it...
item.content:encoded:
Great lecture.
I sent it to my director – let’s see if we can use it…
